rows.label: qev014301_MSG0001
rows.name: I'm glad I ran into you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Alice and I have been investigating the people
responsible for the attack at my speech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0003
rows.name: We've found proof it was Alex and his followers![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0004
rows.name: I was hoping we might ask for your help again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_JNK0010
rows.name: Express Concern

rows.label: qev014301_SEL0011
rows.name: Check whether Eliza is well enough for such activity.

rows.label: qev014301_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev014301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Eliza how she learned the identity of the shooter.

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm good as new, thanks to the Ma-non who treated
me. He's a real wizard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0006
rows.name:
And wanting to pay him back only makes me more
eager to put a stop to Alex's plot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0007
rows.name:
They fled New LA like rats off a sinking starship,
and now they're in hiding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Our sources tell us they're planning to slaughter all the
xenoforms in the city, and that they've been gathering
weaponsâ€”including Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Which is why we have to stop them before something
truly irreparable happens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'd like you to speak with Cheche, the Nopon intel
dealer who uncovered the link between Alex and
the shooter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Once you've learned where Alex is hiding, you can go
there and stop this madness once and for all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0012
rows.name:
At this point, we've got a pretty big network of
Nopon allies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0013
rows.name:
An intel dealer named Cheche uncovered the link
between the shooter and Alex.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0014
rows.name:
He also said Alex's group has been gathering weapons
and Skells so they can kill every last xenoform in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0015
rows.name:
I can forgive what they've done to me, but this is
genocide. We can't allow it to happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0016
rows.name:
Speak with Cheche and find out where Alex and his
cronies are hiding. The time has come to put an end
to this madness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0017
rows.name: Can I count on your help, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0018
rows.name:
I still haven't given up hope that Alex will listen to
reason and turn away from violence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0019
rows.name:
But their recent actions have crossed a line.
If you feel your life is in danger...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0020
rows.name: Well, do what you must.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0021
rows.name:
You're way too nice, Eliza.
These are the people who SHOT you, remember?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0022
rows.name: I'll never forgive them. They all deserve to die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_JNK0110
rows.name: Judge

rows.label: qev014301_SEL0111
rows.name: Agree with Alice that Alex must pay for his crimes.

rows.label: qev014301_JNK0120
rows.name: Forgive

rows.label: qev014301_SEL0121
rows.name:
Agree with Eliza that they should
stick to diplomacy if they can.

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0023
rows.name: ...Perhaps I am too kindhearted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0024
rows.name: And that may have led to suffering...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0025
rows.name: Well then, perhaps we should do as you and Alice say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Regardless, I leave it to you. Stop their plans
however you think best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0027
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0028
rows.name:
Your kindness and strength give me the courage
to keep going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0029
rows.name: I hope you stay true to your kind nature as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0030
rows.name: I trust you. Stop their plans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0031
rows.name:
You should find Cheche the informant at the west end
of Melville Street. Speak with him first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0032
rows.name:
You should find Cheche the informant at the west end
of Melville Street.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0033
rows.name:
He refused to give details on Alex's whereabouts to a
couple of rank amateurs like us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0034
rows.name:
But can you try talking to him? We have to get that
information about Alex![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0035
rows.name: So Alex and his group are in Cauldros...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0036
rows.name: Please hurry there and put a stop to this evil.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0053
rows.name:
It's over now, isn't it? For good.
Yes, well, I'm just glad you're safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0054
rows.name:
Now New LA and the rest of Mira can build towards
a lasting peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0055
rows.name: Yes. Things are going to get busy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0056
rows.name: Bring it on! Getting there together will be half the fun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0057
rows.name: We've already lost so many along the way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0058
rows.name:
I pledge to do all I can to see that no more lives are
lost in the struggle for equality and acceptance in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_JNK0310
rows.name: Doubt Eliza

rows.label: qev014301_SEL0311
rows.name: Question if that's too much for Eliza to handle.

rows.label: qev014301_JNK0320
rows.name: Encourage Alice

rows.label: qev014301_SEL0321
rows.name: Tell Alice to hang in there.

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0059
rows.name: Goodness, I hope it won't just be me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0060
rows.name:
This is about the whole city's future. The lives of every
human and alien living here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0061
rows.name:
I'll need help from Alice and everyone else along
the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0062
rows.name:
Hey, thanks! But this isn't just about me, you know?
It's about Eliza and everyone else![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0063
rows.name:
After all, if we're gonna make New LA a place where
humans and xenoforms can live as friends, it'll take
every last citizen to make it happen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0064
rows.name: Oh! Eliza, don't forget [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] reward![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0065
rows.name: Of course. Thank you for helping us time and again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0066
rows.name:
I pray this is the last time we'll have need of your
services.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014301_MSG0067
rows.name:
But once this long fight is over, I hope you'll join us
in celebrating.[ST:wait ]
